LABEL: 0x2A6
STRING: 「Wake up!」

LABEL: 0x2C4
STRING: 「Hey, I said wake up!」

LABEL: 0x2EE
STRING: I was inside a dream in the middle of light sleep.

LABEL: 0x30A
STRING: As usual, her cheerful voice demanded me to wake up early in the morning.

LABEL: 0x356
STRING: 「How long are you going to stay in bed?!」

LABEL: 0x382
STRING: 「Hurry and wake up!」

LABEL: 0x3A6
STRING: A persistent voice called out to me.

LABEL: 0x3C4
STRING: Her voice, which was gradually growing stronger, showed no signs of giving up.

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: You're... going to keep going until I wake up, aren't you?

LABEL: 0x43C
STRING: I was sleeping so comfortably, too...

LABEL: 0x472
STRING: Why don't you let me sleep properly once in a while?

LABEL: 0x4B2
STRING: I grabbed my blanket, pulled it up, and crawled under it.

LABEL: 0x4F8
STRING: 「Just a little more...」

LABEL: 0x51E
STRING: 「Like I said...!」

LABEL: 0x540
STRING: This exasperated voice and motherly tone were a habit of hers.

LABEL: 0x582
STRING: She got angry like a kid, but was bad at scolding people.

LABEL: 0x5C8
STRING: I knew that, but I couldn't help but indulge her.

LABEL: 0x60A
STRING: I turned my back to her and tried to fall asleep again.

LABEL: 0x640
STRING: And at that moment...

LABEL: 0x6E5
STRING: The lights turned on in the room.

LABEL: 0x709
STRING: Brightness shot through my closed eyelids.

LABEL: 0x747
STRING: Abruptly, all of my senses were making me wake up.

LABEL: 0x787
STRING: 「Come on, give it up already!」

LABEL: 0x7AD
STRING: Damn it... You want to wake me up that badly?

LABEL: 0x7E1
STRING: I rolled my body in the opposite direction this time, trying to resist.

LABEL: 0x829
STRING: *Gong*

LABEL: 0x83D
STRING: My head hit the wall.

LABEL: 0x85D
STRING: Huh? Was this side of the bed facing the wall...?

LABEL: 0x89F
STRING: A strange feeling swirled in my brain.

LABEL: 0x934
STRING: While dealing with the blur, my thoughts gradually became clearer.

LABEL: 0x97E
STRING: So that was it, huh? I gave up and pushed the futon away.

LABEL: 0xA33
STRING: I saw an unfamiliar ceiling.

LABEL: 0xA51
STRING: And, an empty room.

LABEL: 0xA77
STRING: What the hell was this place――

LABEL: 0xA95
STRING: 「Nee-san...?」

LABEL: 0xAB3
STRING: Muttering to myself, I remembered.

LABEL: 0xAD7
STRING: Right. I wasn't used to seeing it, but I did recognize it.

LABEL: 0xB13
STRING: This was the <SHEEP III>...

LABEL: 0xB38
STRING: I see. I was still in the depths of the sea...

LABEL: 0xB66
STRING: But, I had heard my sister's voice just now.

LABEL: 0xB9C
STRING: I looked around, but there was no one there.

LABEL: 0xBCA
STRING: I thought for sure that someone had called me, but――

LABEL: 0xC2F
STRING: 【It is morning.】

LABEL: 0xC47
STRING: 【It is morning. It's time to wake up.】

LABEL: 0xC6F
STRING: ...It was this thing.

LABEL: 0xC8B
STRING: The artificial voice of the AI POL, that was as close to a human's as possible.

LABEL: 0xD27
STRING: 「Shit...」

LABEL: 0xD45
STRING: I slammed my hand to the wall with all my might to make it stop.

LABEL: 0xDCE
STRING: 【Good morning.】

LABEL: 0xDF2
STRING: 「Yeah, yeah, good morning.」

LABEL: 0xE16
STRING: As I got up, the lights in the room turned brighter.

LABEL: 0xE54
STRING: Honestly, trying to wake me up with a human voice was foul play...

LABEL: 0xE92
STRING: Along with my waking consciousness, memories of last night came flooding back.

LABEL: 0xECC
STRING: Two days had gone by since the accident.

LABEL: 0xEE7
STRING: Quite a bit of time had passed.

LABEL: 0xF2B
STRING: I stood up from my bed, stretched, and caught sight of the POL speakers again.

LABEL: 0xF80
STRING: ...I wondered why.

LABEL: 0xF9E
STRING: I hadn't paid it any mind until now, but POL's voice somehow reminded me of Nee-san――

LABEL: 0xFFD
STRING: They probably picked a voice that would feel familiar to everyone, but...

LABEL: 0x105B
STRING: I never thought I would have a dream like that.

LABEL: 0x108F
STRING: I'd been feeling strange since waking up.

LABEL: 0x10B1
STRING: However, it wasn't a bad feeling by any means.

LABEL: 0x10D9
STRING: I needed to switch gears and get out of here today――

LABEL: 0x13BA
STRING: 「Oh, Katagiri-san, you're late.」

LABEL: 0x13EB
STRING: When I headed to the lobby, everyone but me was already there.

LABEL: 0x1433
STRING: To be precise, Hikari wasn't there either, but...

LABEL: 0x145D
STRING: Our breakfast was a simple preserved meal.

LABEL: 0x148D
STRING: Having a great-tasting seafood meal like this that could be eaten right after opening... That's ROMLES for you.

LABEL: 0x14DF
STRING: It wasn't weirdly gooey or anything, and I would have no complaints about eating it at a regular dinner table.

LABEL: 0x1531
STRING: Even Yukari, who had said she was tired of eating these, was eating in silence.

LABEL: 0x157F
STRING: ...Wait, was it always this quiet?

LABEL: 0x15B7
STRING: Never mind Hiragino and Yukari, but Tokiwa and Touri were too silent...

LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: Touri looked between Tokiwa and Reiri as she meekly brought a slice of bread to her mouth.

LABEL: 0x174F
STRING: Whether Reiri was aware of her sister's gaze or not, I didn't know,

LABEL: 0x179B
STRING: but she was sitting on the floor and grasping her knees without eating anything.

LABEL: 0x17F5
STRING: Tokiwa, on the other hand...

LABEL: 0x1881
STRING: 「Stare‾...」

LABEL: 0x18A4
STRING: She was staring at Reiri with moist eyes while giving words to her actions.

LABEL: 0x18EE
STRING: She looked idiotic with her fried horse mackerel hanging from her mouth, but her gaze was sharp.

LABEL: 0x1944
STRING: Actually, I was surprised she could make a sound like that with that thing in her mouth.

LABEL: 0x1999
STRING: 「Stare‾...」

LABEL: 0x19E5
STRING: There was no way Reiri wouldn't notice what Tokiwa was doing, but she didn't even bother to be annoyed. She was completely unresponsive.

LABEL: 0x1A4F
STRING: Tokiwa stared at Reiri without any sign of stopping, as if she didn't like that.

LABEL: 0x1AA5
STRING: ...Wait, why the hell was she glaring at her with such resentful eyes?

LABEL: 0x1AF5
STRING: I got that she was angry with her because of what she had done to Hikari, putting her on this ship and using her for <Alice>,

LABEL: 0x1B5A
STRING: but weren't they getting along fine during dinner yesterday?

LABEL: 0x1BB6
STRING: Maybe she went to bed and woke up today to find that her anger had returned.

LABEL: 0x1BFA
STRING: That was really nasty.

LABEL: 0x1C2B
STRING: 「Stare‾...」

LABEL: 0x1CB5
STRING: 「Hey, stop holding that thing in your mouth.」

LABEL: 0x1D55
STRING: 「Gah――」

LABEL: 0x1DB1
STRING: The moment Hiragino smacked her on the head, the fried mackerel in Tokiwa's mouth went flying.

LABEL: 0x1E03
STRING: It flew in a magnificent parabola, heading straight to where she was staring just now...

LABEL: 0x1E81
STRING: Nice one, Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1EA5
STRING: She smacked the tail of the flying mackerel with her hand before it hit her cheek.

LABEL: 0x1EF3
STRING: She turned to face Tokiwa with a terrifying look on her face.

LABEL: 0x2094
STRING: 「I beg your pardon?」

LABEL: 0x2122
STRING: 「...I'm going to rip you apart.」

LABEL: 0x2157
STRING: Rip her apart... What the hell?

LABEL: 0x2183
STRING: Reiri spoke in a tone that made it sound like she wasn't joking, however.

LABEL: 0x21C5
STRING: Tokiwa, as one would expect, read the situation, or rather, sensed something by instinct

LABEL: 0x2219
STRING: and covered her mouth with the sleeve of her kimono.

LABEL: 0x230A
STRING: 「...Well, that was Sousuke-san's fault, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x235D
STRING: 「What did I do?!」

LABEL: 0x23F7
STRING: 「You're the one who hit the launch switch.」

LABEL: 0x2431
STRING: 「I just set things up.」

LABEL: 0x24D9
STRING: 「What are you talking about, you moron?」

LABEL: 0x2500
STRING: Reiri whispered in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x2524
STRING: Undeterred, Tokiwa nodded her head like she had settled the issue herself.

LABEL: 0x2576
STRING: At some point, her anger toward Reiri had apparently cooled down as well.

LABEL: 0x25AE
STRING: What the hell did she want, this kid...?

LABEL: 0x2629
STRING: 「――Now, everyone.」

LABEL: 0x2650
STRING: Around the time we had finished eating, Yukari stood up in front of everyone.

LABEL: 0x26F4
STRING: 「About forty hours have passed since the accident.」

LABEL: 0x2785
STRING: 「I tried contacting the surface again this morning, but there was no connection yet.」

LABEL: 0x27CD
STRING: 「I don't know how much longer the <SHEEP III> can hold out...」

LABEL: 0x287B
STRING: 「Today is the day―let's get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x28AE
STRING: The quiet tone of her voice exuded certain determination.

LABEL: 0x28E2
STRING: However, escaping from here was...

LABEL: 0x290C
STRING: How exactly were we supposed to do that...?

LABEL: 0x2932
STRING: We didn't know any exact method.

LABEL: 0x295E
STRING: Her declaration, when we had no means of escape, rang hollow.

LABEL: 0x29C5
STRING: 「...It'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x29E8
STRING: Hiragino's voice echoed inside the silent lobby.

LABEL: 0x2AE5
STRING: 「We'll figure out a way to contact them somehow.」

LABEL: 0x2B7C
STRING: 「We'll help you, too. If we work together, we can make it work.」

LABEL: 0x2BC1
STRING: Hiragino patted Yukari on the head to cheer her up.

LABEL: 0x2C58
STRING: She brushed his hand away at lightning speed.

LABEL: 0x2C8E
STRING: ...Were they close or not?

LABEL: 0x2CB6
STRING: For some reason, a lukewarm atmosphere filled the lobby.

LABEL: 0x2CEA
STRING: Touri murmured with serious eyes.

LABEL: 0x2DD3
STRING: 「...Do you really think we can all get out of here?」

LABEL: 0x2E16
STRING: 「Touri?」

LABEL: 0x2E3D
STRING: 「Don't you all actually think that there's no way out?」

LABEL: 0x2EA4
STRING: Touri had been somewhat listless since this morning, and we were at a loss for words when she asked us that.

LABEL: 0x2EF8
STRING: I had wondered if she was feeling down because of how Tokiwa and Reiri were acting, but she seemed to be thinking about something more serious.

LABEL: 0x2F64
STRING: It wasn't that she'd given up on escaping.

LABEL: 0x2F8A
STRING: But she didn't know what to do in order to make it happen,

LABEL: 0x2FCE
STRING: or if there was any hope of us getting out even if we thought about it calmly...

LABEL: 0x30DD
STRING: 「Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x30F7
STRING: 「You're right. As things stand, we can't say for sure we have any hope of escaping.」

LABEL: 0x319A
STRING: 「However, I'm not just going to sit and watch,

LABEL: 0x31E0
STRING: nor am I speaking in ideals.」

LABEL: 0x323F
STRING: 「I saw it this morning.」

LABEL: 0x32F2
STRING: Touri's whole body trembled as she looked straight down at her feet and spoke in a whisper.

LABEL: 0x3387
STRING: 「...Maybe it was a dream.」

LABEL: 0x33A7
STRING: 「I hope it was just a dream.」

LABEL: 0x33D3
STRING: 「I woke up this morning, and there was light outside my window...」

LABEL: 0x340B
STRING: 「I thought it was pretty, so I looked.」

LABEL: 0x343D
STRING: 「That light... was moving.」

LABEL: 0x3468
STRING: The light outside the window had moved.

LABEL: 0x3488
STRING: <COOS>―I couldn't help but think about it.

LABEL: 0x352E
STRING: 「No. It was completely different from yesterday's light.」

LABEL: 0x355E
STRING: 「I was wondering what it was, and I thought it would be bad if something was wrong, so I looked...」

LABEL: 0x35AE
STRING: 「It moved again.」

LABEL: 0x35E2
STRING: 「Once I got a better look, it was a huge eye the size of the window.」

LABEL: 0x3650
STRING: Each of the <SHEEP III's> private rooms had circular windows.

LABEL: 0x3685
STRING: A giant eye had clung tightly to it as if to cover it.

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: That eye had been staring at us...

LABEL: 0x36FC
STRING: 「It left the ship right away and went off somewhere, but it's still somewhere out there...」

LABEL: 0x37B3
STRING: 「Hey... What's in this sea?!」

LABEL: 0x37E5
STRING: 「How are we supposed to escape from here when there are monsters like that around...?!」

LABEL: 0x3844
STRING: 「Deep-sea gigantism.」

LABEL: 0x3887
STRING: Touri's voice covered Tokiwa's mumbling.

LABEL: 0x38B7
STRING: Deep-sea gigantism...

LABEL: 0x3947
STRING: 「In the deep sea, creatures sometimes grow to bizarre sizes.」

LABEL: 0x3991
STRING: 「One example is a giant squid.」

LABEL: 0x39BF
STRING: 「An oarfish is another.」

LABEL: 0x3A4A
STRING: 「It's not unusual for creatures to grow to enormous sizes in the deep sea,

LABEL: 0x3A98
STRING: so don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x3AE9
STRING: Tokiwa spread her arms wide and took on an enigmatic expression filled with compassion.

LABEL: 0x3B29
STRING: ...Did she want us to jump into her arms?

LABEL: 0x3B63
STRING: I wasn't sure... On the outside, this seemed fine, but on the inside, this was still Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3BC5
STRING: What a complicated feeling.

LABEL: 0x3C55
STRING: 「Well, if it was that big, it was probably a variant of a giant squid...」

LABEL: 0x3CA5
STRING: 「If you think of it as a cute little squid, there's no need to worry, is there?」

LABEL: 0x3D04
STRING: Rest assured, said Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3D32
STRING: Touri, on the other hand, still looked uneasy.

LABEL: 0x3E33
STRING: 「But... But, Tokiwa-chan.」

LABEL: 0x3ECD
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x3EFE
STRING: 「Do squids have four eyes?」

LABEL: 0x3FE1
STRING: With a poof, the lights went out.

LABEL: 0x4005
STRING: 「――What the hell!?」

LABEL: 0x4038
STRING: 「Everyone, stay where you are!」

LABEL: 0x4065
STRING: A blackout...?

LABEL: 0x407F
STRING: In a deep sea like this... Now that I thought about it, the fact that the power had been on without issue up until now was even more abnormal.

LABEL: 0x40E3
STRING: It was bound to happen at some point, but I never thought it would be so sudden.

LABEL: 0x412D
STRING: What in the world triggered it?

LABEL: 0x4151
STRING: Did we just run out of time?

LABEL: 0x4171
STRING: Did someone turn off the lights?

LABEL: 0x4195
STRING: What about the computers and other equipment?

LABEL: 0x41B1
STRING: And, the heating?

LABEL: 0x41C7
STRING: Was there a chance it'd be restored?

LABEL: 0x41ED
STRING: Various questions swirled inside my head in waves.

LABEL: 0x422E
STRING: 「POL!」

LABEL: 0x4245
STRING: 「POL! Can you hear me?! POL!!」

LABEL: 0x4282
STRING: Yukari called out loudly in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x42B0
STRING: No response.

LABEL: 0x42CA
STRING: It was working this morning without any problems――

LABEL: 0x4319
STRING: 「Hey, is everyone okay?」

LABEL: 0x4346
STRING: 「I'm fine, but...」

LABEL: 0x436C
STRING: 「Reiri, Touri, Tokiwa... how about you?」

LABEL: 0x439C
STRING: I called out to them in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x43BC
STRING: The lights had gone out.

LABEL: 0x43D6
STRING: As I gradually got used to the darkness, I could make out faint silhouettes.

LABEL: 0x452A
STRING: 「I-I'm fine. Reiri? What about Reiri?!」

LABEL: 0x4577
STRING: 「...Stop making a fuss.」

LABEL: 0x45A2
STRING: 「Tokki is doing well, too.」

LABEL: 0x45CD
STRING: They were all there... thank god.

LABEL: 0x45F9
STRING: No one seemed to be hurt.

LABEL: 0x465D
STRING: 「Yukari-san, this situation...」

LABEL: 0x46F1
STRING: 「Let's get to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x477A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san and... Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x4816
STRING: 「This is Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x4845
STRING: 「Come with me to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x48E7
STRING: 「I wonder if she's okay――」

LABEL: 0x4924
STRING: 「Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x497B
STRING: I heard Hiragino's calm and low voice.

LABEL: 0x49A1
STRING: It felt like this space dominated by darkness had warmed up a little.

LABEL: 0x4A57
STRING: 「I'll go check on her.」

LABEL: 0x4A79
STRING: 「You go and do what you have to, Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x4AC0
STRING: 「Sousuke-san...『Good job!』」

LABEL: 0x4AEF
STRING: I felt like she was giving him a thumbs-up.

LABEL: 0x4B54
STRING: 「Now then, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x4B7D
STRING: Relying on Yukari's running footsteps, we headed for the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x4E48
STRING: 「...It was strange for the power to hold out this long in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x4E8C
STRING: 「I don't know what to say.」

LABEL: 0x4F55
STRING: The panels were all turned off.

LABEL: 0x4F85
STRING: The monitors that had been on before were dark again, as they had been just after the sinking.

LABEL: 0x5045
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, can't you do something about this?」

LABEL: 0x507C
STRING: 「I'm not sure... Unlike right after the sinking, when the equipment itself was fine,

LABEL: 0x50D2
STRING: if the hardware's lost power, it's not really within my abilities to do something about it.」

LABEL: 0x519A
STRING: 「I... see.」

LABEL: 0x51BF
STRING: Yukari sighed.

LABEL: 0x51E3
STRING: If the power was turned off in the first place, there was nothing I could do about it.

LABEL: 0x52F8
STRING: 「Maybe there's an emergency power source somewhere.」

LABEL: 0x533A
STRING: 「It looks like the air conditioning itself is still working.」

LABEL: 0x5377
STRING: She was right... The low hum of the air conditioning continued without issue.

LABEL: 0x53B5
STRING: If the heating was turned off in this deep sea, the temperature inside the <SHEEP III> would drop rapidly.

LABEL: 0x540C
STRING: If that were to happen, we wouldn't be able to wait long for rescue...

LABEL: 0x5458
STRING: 「But, why did the power suddenly go out...?」

LABEL: 0x54FC
STRING: 「It seems like we're simply out of time, so we can consider it as a time limit.」

LABEL: 0x5549
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x556F
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x5583
STRING: What bothered me was the last thing Touri had said.

LABEL: 0x5656
STRING: 「Do squids have four eyes?」

LABEL: 0x5686
STRING: A giant creature―one with four eyes at that.

LABEL: 0x56C3
STRING: This monster she said she saw.

LABEL: 0x56ED
STRING: Was it just a dream or hallucination like Touri suspected?

LABEL: 0x5733
STRING: I hoped that was the case...

LABEL: 0x57F9
STRING: Since the power had gone out at a completely ominous timing,

LABEL: 0x5839
STRING: I couldn't help but wonder if the abnormal creature had something to do with this situation.

LABEL: 0x588B
STRING: There was no way that was possible.

LABEL: 0x58B5
STRING: And yet――

LABEL: 0x593D
STRING: ――At that moment...

LABEL: 0x5957
STRING: Suddenly, I looked at the large window inside the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x59AD
STRING: And, at what was reflected there...

LABEL: 0x5A44
STRING: Everyone present was speechless.

LABEL: 0x5A78
STRING: Even Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5AF9
STRING: It was... a giant shadow.

LABEL: 0x5B1B
STRING: A large, slimy creature.

LABEL: 0x5B45
STRING: A single tentacle as thick as a giant squid

LABEL: 0x5B75
STRING: passed in front of the window like it was drifting.

LABEL: 0x5C6F
STRING: The slithering tentacles branched out the further they went,

LABEL: 0x5C99
STRING: each one elongated and slender,

LABEL: 0x5CC5
STRING: with suckers and claws visible at the end of them.

LABEL: 0x5D0D
STRING: Eventually, the tentacles withdrew from the window, revealing their master's main body.

LABEL: 0x5D49
STRING: With nothing left to block the way, what appeared was a round head and countless large eyes.

LABEL: 0x5E4D
STRING: It wasn't just four――

LABEL: 0x5E70
STRING: Its round, shining eyes were lined up asymmetrically.

LABEL: 0x5E9C
STRING: And beneath those countless eyes was a large mouth.

LABEL: 0x5ECC
STRING: It gaped open, as if its entire head had been torn apart.

LABEL: 0x5F0C
STRING: I couldn't tell its exact size,

LABEL: 0x5F36
STRING: but it looked like it could swallow the front section of the <SHEEP III> whole.

LABEL: 0x5F85
STRING: It was like a living mountain, and it was definitely alive.

LABEL: 0x607D
STRING: Overwhelming fear.

LABEL: 0x6099
STRING: A simple giant and a grotesque form.

LABEL: 0x60C1
STRING: Death.

LABEL: 0x60D3
STRING: We were going to die.

LABEL: 0x60F1
STRING: A feeling that nothing could go against it, and your life would be lost in an instant.

LABEL: 0x6131
STRING: Its enormous and grotesque form slowly raised what looked like an arm with claws.

LABEL: 0x6185
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x619D
STRING: After a moment, the mountain disappeared.

LABEL: 0x62A5
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x62C7
STRING: I couldn't think of anything.

LABEL: 0x62E7
STRING: I didn't understand anything.

LABEL: 0x6309
STRING: ...Was this a dream?

LABEL: 0x6327
STRING: Unless I thought of this as a dream, I couldn't make sense of what I'd just seen.

LABEL: 0x6375
STRING: Shaking my head, I turned to look for help, and my eyes met with Yukari's.

LABEL: 0x63C2
STRING: 「...What was that?」

LABEL: 0x63E8
STRING: 「What was that thing we just saw...?」

LABEL: 0x6427
STRING: Astonishment, shuddering, and awe.

LABEL: 0x6447
STRING: Yukari whispered, unable to hide her emotions.

LABEL: 0x647B
STRING: I see. In other words, what we just saw was real――

LABEL: 0x64E4
STRING: 「That... would be a creature living symbiotically with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x6527
STRING: Tokiwa sounded like she was trying to make sense of it herself.

LABEL: 0x6551
STRING: Her knowledge and the shock of what she had just witnessed were converging together.

LABEL: 0x6608
STRING: 「Symbiosis with <COOS>...? But, it wasn't glowing.」

LABEL: 0x6658
STRING: 「Even though it didn't emit that characteristic light――」

LABEL: 0x669F
STRING: 「It's no longer at that stage.」

LABEL: 0x66D1
STRING: 「<COOS> has completely rewritten the ecosystem of this sea...」

LABEL: 0x6724
STRING: She spoke in a despairing tone to no one in particular.

LABEL: 0x67D4
STRING: 「Due to an "ozone cage," this area is sealed off from the surrounding waters.」

LABEL: 0x6824
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, do you remember what I told you yesterday?」

LABEL: 0x6872
STRING: 「The bottleneck effect――」

LABEL: 0x6898
STRING: 「In isolated, small groups, the effects of genetic drift are powerful.」

LABEL: 0x68E8
STRING: 「Add to that the acceleration of mutations caused by <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x6924
STRING: 「――And you'll reach speciation in no time.」

LABEL: 0x695C
STRING: 「In other words, that creature must be a new species created by <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x6A33
STRING: 「You said that <COOS> can evolve living beings.」

LABEL: 0x6A6F
STRING: 「Simply mutating a gene is an easy way to eliminate them.」

LABEL: 0x6ABB
STRING: 「It will end up being a one-generation mutation.」

LABEL: 0x6AF3
STRING: 「Because, they have to find a mate with the same mutation in this wide sea that's capable of crossbreeding.」

LABEL: 0x6B55
STRING: 「But... because of me, <COOS> was not eliminated.」

LABEL: 0x6B9F
STRING: 「It's precisely because they're geographically isolated that they've been able to "evolve" properly.」

LABEL: 0x6BF7
STRING: 「The ones who gave birth to that creature were me and ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x6C44
STRING: On the "Fourth Day," <COOS> had sank to the sea floor,

LABEL: 0x6C7C
STRING: where it was quarantined by an ozone cage designed to keep its effects from spreading.

LABEL: 0x6CCE
STRING: But ironically, being surrounded by a cage

LABEL: 0x6D0C
STRING: brought about a new ecosystem to this closed sea.

LABEL: 0x6DB6
STRING: 「It really is... the "Fifth Day."」

LABEL: 0x6DEF
STRING: Those were the words Reiri had spoken.

LABEL: 0x6E1B
STRING: The "Fourth Day" was already a distant memory.

LABEL: 0x6E4D
STRING: That was what I had thought.

LABEL: 0x6E6D
STRING: However, it wasn't over yet.

LABEL: 0x6E95
STRING: 「...What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x6ECA
STRING: 「Don't you know?」

LABEL: 0x6F0A
STRING: 「What God created on the fifth day.」

LABEL: 0x6F3F
STRING: On the "Fifth Day" in the Bible――

LABEL: 0x6FD5
STRING: Tokiwa recited the text as if it were written on the large window before her.

LABEL: 0x712F
STRING: Then God commanded, "Let the water be filled with many kinds of living beings, %N

LABEL: 0x7185
STRING: and let the air be filled with birds."

LABEL: 0x7245
STRING: So God created the great sea-monsters, all kinds of creatures that live in the water, %N

LABEL: 0x72A1
STRING: and all kinds of birds.

LABEL: 0x7327
STRING: And God was pleased with what he saw. %N

LABEL: 0x7353
STRING: He blessed them all and told the creatures that live in the water to reproduce,

LABEL: 0x7405
STRING: and to fill the sea, and he told the birds to increase in number.

LABEL: 0x748B
STRING: Evening passed and morning came.

LABEL: 0x74EA
STRING: - that was the fifth day.

LABEL: 0x7726
STRING: They were created――

LABEL: 0x774E
STRING: Giant monsters

LABEL: 0x7763
STRING: swarming the seas.
